sentences: Eszter Perenyi (born December 15, 1943) is a Budapest-born Hungarian violinist and Meritorious Artist of Hungary.
She also performed abroad in such countries as Germany, Italy and Sweden and since 1975 became a teacher at Liszt Academy.
In 2002 she became a recipient of the Bartók-Pásztory Prize and five years later was named a Merited Artist of the Republic of Hungary.
